price: Kuma lalle ne idan aka kashe, ku a cikin hanyar Allah, ko kuwa kuka mutu, haƙĩƙa, gãfara daga Allah da rahama ne mafi alhẽri daga abin da suke tãrãwa.
arabic: وَلَئِن قُتِلۡتُمۡ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡ مُتُّمۡ لَمَغۡفِرَةٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَحۡمَةٌ خَيۡرٞ مِّمَّا يَجۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wala-in qutil'tum fī sabīli al-lahi aw muttum lamaghfiratun mina al-lahi waraḥmatun khayrun mimmā yajmaʿūna
